snippet.title: [Subbed] Brothers Conflict Passion Pink Opening
snippet.description:
Translated by silvermoon249(http://silvermoon249.livejournal.com/46008.html#cutid1)
EDIT: Maybe someday I'll reupload this along with Brilliant Blue opening with HD quality that the Vita remake uses.
Thankfully, I could get a higher quality of this and Brilliant Blue at the game website so I don't have to use what Youtube have. Anyway, this is a VN for the PSP that released back in 2011, and as you might suggest, it doesn't released in West. :( A translation project is in progress though along with Brilliant Blue, they said they could released the full patch for Passion Pink in summer, which is great. :D This game have Masaomi, Kaname, Tsubaki, Subaru, Yuusuke, Subaru, and Hikaru route while the other guys is included in Brilliant Blue. I already have tried the game, and I have to say, it's quite short and can get boring fast if you only focused on one guy(me? I stick with Subaru of course~ XD). The gameplay is sorta like Tokimemo games, if you ever played one, this should be a breeze. :D Also, it have a bug with the character's voice that doesn't match with the dialouge box(which is bad if you don't understand Japanese). Well, in the end, it's quite enjoyable despite how short it is. I hope they make another VN in the future. Whoops, I talk too much. Enjoy! :D
Song: AFFECTIONS
Singers:
Suzumura Ken'ichi - Asahina Tsubaki's seiyuu
Toriumi Kousuke - Asahina Azusa's seiyuu
